nodes.text: The Eye of Tulak was an ancient Sith artifact that was discovered by the Sith Lord Paladius by the time of the Cold War. In this time, he took the relic with him to Nar Shaddaa where he established a cult amongst the lower classes. Darth Zash dispatched her apprentice Kallig to Nar Shaddaa in order to retrieve the Sith artifact that was assembled with others as part of a ritual to be conducted on Dromund Kaas.
